comments.body: Will this break compatibility for users who were building against the previous API? It seems like this is a public API, so we might need to make a second version rather than replace the current one.
comments.diffHunk:

-def python_cogroup(rdd, other, numPartitions):

-    ws = other.map(lambda (k, v): (k, (2, v)))

comments.body: Okay I looked yet again, this entire file is not exposed in e.g. the docs, so I guess this isn't public.
